gov.hhs.fha.nhinc.pdmp.services

Interface PdmpService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PdmpServiceImpl

    public interface PdmpService
    Performs lookup on PDMP service for all prescription data for a given patient
    Author:
    jassmit

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DateRangeType buildDateRange(Date beginRange, Date endRange)
      Transforms user provided dates for range to PDMP service date range parameter
      List<PrescriptionInfo> getAllPrescriptions(PdmpPatient patient)
      Parses the specific prescriptions from the found patient prescription results
      XMLGregorianCalendar getGregorianCalendar(Date date)
      Transforms date to Gregorian Calendar
      SexCodeType getSexCodeType(String gender)
      Transforms user input on gender type to gender type object used by PDMP service
      PdmpPatient searchForPdmpInfo(PatientType patient, DateRangeType dateRange)
      Searchs for prescription data using a patient demographics and a given date range for date of prescription

    • Method Detail

      • searchForPdmpInfo

        PdmpPatient searchForPdmpInfo(PatientType patient,
                              DateRangeType dateRange)
        Searchs for prescription data using a patient demographics and a given date range for date of prescription
        Parameters:
        patient - demographics including name, gender, date of birth used to find prescription data for patient
        dateRange - search parameter for date range of when prescription was prescribed
        Returns:
